TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AddRequest extends System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest

Docs.summary: The AddRequest class adds an entry to the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The request may be added to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlRequestDocument> or it can be used as the parameter for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.SendRequest%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The AddRequest constructor creates an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string distinguishedName, class System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute[] attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: The `distinguishedName` of the new object in the directory.
An array, of objects, that contains the attributes for this object. This parameter may be .
Docs.summary: The AddRequest constructor creates an instance of the class using the specified distinguished name and attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string distinguishedName, string objectClass) cil managed

Docs.param: The `distinguishedName` of the new object in the directory.
The object class for this object. If this parameter is , an exception is thrown.
Docs.summary: The AddRequest constructor creates an instance of the class using the specified and the object class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value specified in the `objectClass` parameter is added to the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AddRequest.Attributes%2A> property. This value can be modified after this constructor is called.

Docs.exception: The parameter contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: The Attributes property contains a of attribute-value pairs for the object.
Docs.value: A of attribute-value pairs for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property cannot be set.

Docs.summary: The DistinguishedName property contains the distinguished name of the object.
Docs.value: The distinguished name of the object.
